gameProjects.title: Cops N' Zombies
gameProjects.description: A multiplayer horror social deduction game where one player is secretly a zombie. Developing alone and working towards shipping on Steam.

details.overview: Goal is to develop a high quality shipped game to release on steam. Developed and expanded most features alone and by putting together different tutorials, used frameworks such as AdvancedLocomotionSystem and used marketplace art assets

gameProjects.title: Fighting/Party Mini Game
gameProjects.description: Multiplayer fighting party game where players control muscular animals in different minigames.

details.overview: A game prototype I worked on where you use different funny muscular animal characters and fight other players boxing style while also playing different mini games. Decided to finish work on Cops n Zombies instead.

gameProjects.title: Survival Game
gameProjects.description: A classic multiplayer co-op survival game with AI, building, combat and inventory. Was very out of scope but learned a lot.

details.overview: Used a mix of C++ and blueprints while also following tutorials to learn how to develop each system in multiplayer. Integrated a premade building system asset and random art assets for prototyping
features: Survival mechanics: health, hunger, thirst, and stamina
Melee and ranged weapon systems with various weapons
Various AI behaviors including roaming, patrolling, and boss encounters

webProjects.title: Pokemon Battle Simulator
webProjects.description: A Pokemon Battle Simulator using PokeAPI where players can roll random Pokemon and moves, then battle against a computer opponent to see whose move is more powerful.

details.overview: A simple Pokemon Battle Simulator built with JavaScript that uses the PokeAPI to fetch random Pokemon and their moves. Players can roll random Pokemon and moves, then battle against a computer opponent to see whose move is more powerful.
features: Battle system based on move power
howToPlay: Click "Roll Pokemon" to get a random Pokemon
When you have a Pokemon, click "Roll Move" to get a random attack
When you have the Pokemon and move you like, click "Start Battle" to battle
View the battle results in the battle log
